org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl

类 ConnectionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl.ConnectionImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Connection

    public class ConnectionImpl
extends Object
implements Connection
    This is the connection to remote BlackTie services. It must be created using the ConnectionFactory#getConnection()

      • ConnectionImpl

        public ConnectionImpl(ConnectionFactory connectionFactory,
                      Properties properties)
               throws org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException
        The connection
        参数:
        connectionFactory - The connection factory that created this connection.
        properties - The properties that this connection was created with.
        抛出:
        org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException

        public Buffer tpalloc(String type,
                      String subtype)
               throws ConnectionException,
                      org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException
        Allocate a new buffer
        指定者:
        tpalloc 在接口中 Connection
        参数:
        type - The type of the buffer
        subtype - The subtype of the buffer
        返回:
        The new buffer
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - If the buffer was unknown or invalid.

      • tpcall

        public Response tpcall(String svc,
                       Buffer buffer,
                       int flags)
                throws ConnectionException,
                       org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException
        Synchronous call.
        指定者:
        tpcall 在接口中 Connection
        参数:
        svc - The name of the service to call
        buffer - The inbound data
        flags - The flags to use
        返回:
        The returned buffer
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - If the service cannot be contacted.
        org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException

        public int tpcancel(int cd)
             throws ConnectionException
        Cancel the outstanding asynchronous call.
        指定者:
        tpcancel 在接口中 Connection
        参数:
        cd - The connection descriptor
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - If the client cannot be cleaned up.

        flags - The flags to use

      • close

        public void close()
           throws ConnectionException
        Close any resources associated with this connection
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Connection
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - If an open session cannot be cancelled or disconnected.

      • createServiceSession

        public SessionImpl createServiceSession(String name,
                                        int cd,
                                        Object replyTo)
                                 throws ConnectionException
        Used by the service side to create a session for handling the client request.
        参数:
        name - The name of the service.
        cd - The connection descriptor
        replyTo - The client to respond to
        返回:
        The session to use for the service invocation
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - In case the transport cannot be established.

      • hasOpenSessions

        public boolean hasOpenSessions()
        Does this connection have any open sessions? Used to determine if a service has unanswered requests prior to a tpreturn.
        返回:
        True, if there are open conversations or asynchronous XATMI calls open.
